item.description:
We will be joining another meetup group for a night of comedy at the Comedy Zone in Warwick Showcase.

The cost is $10. I do have a few 'buy one get one free' coupons.

Food and drinks are available before and during the show.

Live Comedy with Andy Pitz & Kevin Fitzgerald at Showcase Cinemas Warwick

 

 Andy Pitz
Andy Pitz is certainly on the rise. He's a regular at New York's best comedy clubs including The World Famous Comic Strip Live, The Comedy Cellar and Dangerfield's. One television, Andy has scored spots on The Late Show with David Letterman, The Late Late Show with Craig Ferguson and as a winner on Star Search on CBS. Andy has also worked in Atlantic City and Las Vegas where he has opened for numerous acts including America, Norm McDonald and Robert Klien.



 

Kevin Fitzgerald
Kevin Fitzgerald Born in Brooklyn, New York Kevin Fitzgerald sports a unique perspective on life. His quick wit enabled him to survive Catholic school with no felonies and minimal ruler induced scarring. His love of the English language is always on display, even in the shower. Kevin has left audiences laughing throughout the country. His comic influences include Richard Pryor, Steven Wright, and Jonathon Winters. He studied comedy writing under Gabe Abelson and has appeared on such stages as The Improv, The Comic Strip, and Stand Up New York.
item.how_to_find_us: Let's meet in the tables and chairs directly behind the Comedy Zone ticket booth.

group.name: Mingle with singles 45+ Socializing and dancing

item.name: Comedy Zone at Warwick Showcase
